org.apache.logging.log4j.spi

Interface CleanableThreadContextMap

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ThreadContextMap, ThreadContextMap2
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ObjectThreadContextMap

    public interface CleanableThreadContextMap
extends ThreadContextMap2
    Extension service provider interface to implement additional custom MDC behavior for ThreadContext.
    Since:
    2.8
    See Also:
    ThreadContextMap

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void removeAll(Iterable<String> keys)
      Removes all given localContext map keys from the current thread's localContext map.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ThreadContextMap2

        getReadOnlyContextData, putAll

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ThreadContextMap

        clear, containsKey, get, getCopy, getImmutableMapOrNull, isEmpty, put, remove

    • Method Detail

      • removeAll

        void removeAll(Iterable<String> keys)
        Removes all given localContext map keys from the current thread's localContext map.

        If the current thread does not have a localContext map it is created as a side effect.

        Parameters:
        keys - The keys.
        Since:
        2.8
